'''1.21.101''' is a hotfix for {{BE}} released on August 13, 2025 on most devices and on August 15, 2025 on Xbox, which fixes some bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/38783390143885-Minecraft-1-21-101-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.101 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=August 13, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|fixedin=1.21.101|project=MCPE
|;old
|223910|Grass color in the Swamp and Mangrove Swamp biomes is now much more green than it should be
|225267|Firefly Bush particles spawn offset/displaced from their intended position
|226072|Firefly bush generation is too rare in worlds created after 1.21.100
|226102|{{cd|c{{=}}-1}} target selector is broken
|otherissuescount=4}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
* Fixed a crash that could occur when treatment packs were removed while loading game or loading into a world.
* Fixed an issue with items not being placed into bundles correctly when interacting with hoppers.
* Fixed an issue on PlayStation 5 where downloading large packs when joining Realms and multiplayer worlds would sometimes fail.
